Class LinearLogic

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.logic.multivalued.LinearLogic
public class LinearLogic extends Object
Linear logic - resource-aware logic.

Linear logic treats propositions as resources that are consumed when used. Key connectives: - âŠ— (tensor): multiplicative conjunction - â…‹ (par): multiplicative disjunction - âŠ• (plus): additive disjunction - invalid input: '&' (with): additive conjunction - ! (bang): unlimited resource - ? (whimper): unlimited consumption

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

      Parameters:
      a - first proposition
      b - second proposition
      chooseFirst - true to choose first, false for second
      Returns:

    • with

      public static LinearLogic.Proposition with(LinearLogic.Proposition a, LinearLogic.Proposition b)

      a - first proposition
      b - second proposition

      combined proposition
